display_long_description:
"Skybound Penguin" is a free, exhilarating, and joyful VR flight adventure game! You'll play as a penguin equipped with jet-propelled wings, embarking on an unprecedented fantasy journey through the open skies.

Core Gameplay:
- Aerial Combat: Arm yourself with rocket launchers, bombs, giant hammers, and other weapons for intense sky battles!
- High-Speed Racing: Challenge high-altitude race tracks, use power-ups and flying skills to outmaneuver opponents, and fight for first place!
- Food Frenzy: When it starts raining fish, you and your friends compete to grab the most!
- Multiplayer: Play with friends in the same world and enjoy the social thrills!

Immersive Flight Experience:
- Physical Flight: Take off, accelerate by flapping your arms like wings, or glide with them spread wide! Feel the wind rush past your fingertips in true-to-life VR.
- Free Exploration: Soar through majestic sky islands, ruins, and polar regions, using air currents and power-ups for high-speed maneuvers!

Key Features:
- Diverse Environments: Tropical islands, polar labs, fantasy skylands... each zone offers unique gameplay!
- Physical Interaction: Truly swing your arms to fly, throw bombs, aim and shoot – total immersion!
- Regular Updates: Play for free! Expect more modes, maps, and events coming soon
